title: No Service. Mobile Radio turns off automatically.
content: No service after Android 11 update. Radio power automatically turns itself off when using *#*#4363#*#*. Do not tell me to factory reset my phone, change SIM, reset network, boot in safe mode or do any of the stuff because IT. DOES. NOT. WORK. Fix the issue, google support. Stop telling us to do the same crap. You have a major software bug because of the Android 11 update. FIX IT.
